thread.title: 3 days in new york
thread.title_full: 3 days in new york - Review of Stewart Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: vanda99
title: 3 days in new york
text: We stayed at this hotel for 3 nights while sightseeing in New york. The staff on reception were polite and helpful and check in was speedy. We were upgraded free to a top floor suite which was fantastic. Great views 2 bedrooms lounge kitchen and 2 bathrooms plus they gave us a bottle of wine free. The location was fantastic right opposite madison square garden it was 10 minute walk to Times square and about half hour walk to central park. There is a subway very close . We had a fantastic time in New york and would recomend this hotel.
